long_description: A clean design with rugged materials, comfortable suspension and tons of organization make the Paladin daypack from Mountain Hardwear the perfect computer pack for all sorts of adventures. Quickly access the fully padded 15 in. laptop sleeve through a convenient side zipper on the back panel, a nice feature when going through airport security screening. Main compartment has a wide bucket-style opening for easy access; includes tablet-size pocket, document sleeve and zippered fleece pocket for organization. Top pocket keeps frequently used items handy and includes 2 organizer pockets (1 fabric, 1 mesh) for fragile electronics. Low-profile, quick-access stash pocket located at the very top of the Mountain Hardwear Paladin daypack keeps small items handy. Streamlined shoulder straps and fully padded back panel feature fast-wicking air mesh and strategically placed venting channels to keep you cooler. Lightweight and strong framesheet is shaped to match the curve of your back so the load remains stable and well balanced. Tough 840-denier, rugged body panels combine with durable, PVC-free thermoplastic urethane panels and fully bound seams to ensure durability and long life. Side compression straps; padded front grab handle.
short_description: A clean design with rugged materials, comfortable suspension and tons of organization make the Paladin daypack from Mountain Hardwear the perfect computer pack for all sorts of adventures.
